name: Joyride: live trivia shows
summary:
Think you know a lot? Then prove it on Joyride and win cash prizes!

Play a live trivia game show, then chill with your friends in group video. Relax with fun voice-based party games, watch a unicorn fly over your head, or go nuts guessing what crazy filter you have on your face!

Here are just a few things you can do on Joyride:
* Win cash prizes playing our live trivia game show!
* Hang out with friends without the annoying call; just tap "Join" and, boom, you’re in a video chat!
* Play fun games like trivia and headsup with friends using only your voice
* Discover “magic” words in chat to unlock special effects and custom filters (hint: try saying #blessed)
* Make new friends as you hang out, try on super filters, or compete to win the trivia round!

Note: Need to enjoy fun, meeting cool people, and socializing. Don't be mean. Don't be gross.
